title: Pork chow mein
description: For a crunchy noodle topping, fry some rice noodles before you begin to make the chow mein. Alternatively, top with a handful of ready-made prawn or shrimp crackers.
ingredients: 1 red pepper, quartered, seeds removed, sliced
1 large carrot, peeled and cut into thin julienne strips, around 6cm/2½in long
25g/1oz chunk fresh root ginger, peeled and very finely sliced
225g/8oz can water chestnuts, drained and halved
fried noodles or prawn crackers, to serve
